# defaultTabInterval

**Instance Property**

A number used as the document’s default tab spacing.

## Declaration

```swift
var defaultTabInterval: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property represents the default tab interval in points. The system places tabs after the last specified in [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/#id(tabStops)] at integer multiples of this distance (if positive). Default value is `0.0`.

## Specifying tab information

- **addTabStop(_:)**: Adds the specified tab stop to the paragraph.
- **removeTabStop(_:)**: Removes the first text tab with a location and type equal to the specified tab stop.
- **tabStops**: The text tab objects that represent the paragraph’s tab stops.
